props.prop: SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT,SUM(LINES_ADDED),SUM(LINES_DELETED), IDCOREASSET, NAME FROM FEATURES_IN_VARIATIONPOINTS INNER JOIN CUSTOMIZATION_FACT ON ID_VARIATIONPOINT=IDVARIATIONPOINT INNER JOIN CORE_ASSET ON ID_COREASSET=IDCOREASSET NATURAL JOIN DEVELOPER_BRIDGE WHERE LOWER(FEATURE_NAME)=? AND ID_DEVELOPER=? AND IDPRODUCTRELEASE=? GROUP BY IDVARIATIONPOINT;

SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT,SUM(LINES_ADDED),SUM(LINES_DELETED), IDCOREASSET, NAME FROM FEATURES_IN_VARIATIONPOINTS INNER JOIN CUSTOMIZATION_FACT ON ID_VARIATIONPOINT=IDVARIATIONPOINT INNER JOIN CORE_ASSET ON ID_COREASSET=IDCOREASSET NATURAL JOIN DEVELOPER_BRIDGE WHERE LOWER(FEATURE_NAME)=? AND IDPRODUCTRELEASE=? GROUP BY IDVARIATIONPOINT;

SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT,SUM(LINES_ADDED),SUM(LINES_DELETED), IDCOREASSET, NAME FROM FEATURES_IN_VARIATIONPOINTS INNER JOIN CUSTOMIZATION_FACT ON ID_VARIATIONPOINT=IDVARIATIONPOINT INNER JOIN CORE_ASSET ON ID_COREASSET=IDCOREASSET NATURAL JOIN DEVELOPER_BRIDGE WHERE LOWER(FEATURE_NAME)=? AND IDPRODUCTRELEASE=? GROUP BY IDVARIATIONPOINT;

SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT,SUM(LINES_ADDED),SUM(LINES_DELETED), IDCOREASSET, NAME FROM FEATURES_IN_VARIATIONPOINTS INNER JOIN CUSTOMIZATION_FACT ON ID_VARIATIONPOINT=IDVARIATIONPOINT INNER JOIN core_asset ON ID_COREASSET=IDCOREASSET WHERE LOWER(FEATURE_NAME)=? GROUP BY IDVARIATIONPOINT;
